text: Motion
Motion
...A happy ending...?

No, it's a good theme
I think.
Yes, I really like it too.

We're planning to discuss the direction with everyone
after this today.

I see, the luggage today is bigger than usual
because of that.

Yes, I brought a lot of picture books
hoping to find some usable motifs.
What kind of books did you bring?

"Cinderella", "Sleeping Beauty"...
And "Thumbelina" too.
Chiyuki really likes princess stories, huh?

Hehe, I've always admired stories where girls
have happy endings. I was kind of longing for that.

I have so many things I want to try
so I ended up bringing a lot.

It's a special unit live after all
so it's understandable to be fired up.
Yes...
-Um, Producer-san...
Hm?

Things like childhood dreams, or
deciding to work in a miscellaneous goods store.

As an idol,
wanting to make lots of people smile...
For me, dreams were something in the future.

...Various dreams are becoming part of my everyday life
If this were to be the end of a dream's happy ending──
What would you call this moment, I wonder...?
